data.text: @Shepeiro The same is happening in Bristol.

@Shepeiro Luckily way fewer people end up in hospitals or die despite these relatively high case numbers. Had we seen as many cases as we‘re currently seeing in 2020 before mass vaccination efforts it would’ve been way worse so we’re at least moving in the right direction.
@Aldamir That would make it even worse but not sure if it has reduced yet England had said it was wrapping up mass testing not Scotland as far as I’m aware
@Shepeiro Presumably testing levels in Scotland are low nowadays.
